Translations.Text: Mwarashikiwe n’intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ifise ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro, hanyuma muca mugira intama munyuma yiwe, n’uguca muhemukira imitima yanyu

Mugihe twakira amasezerano yanyu nuguca turerura umusozi hejuru yanyu, duca tubabwira duti:- nimuwufate n’inguvu kuri ibi vyose twabahaye, kandi mutegere neza, nabo bishura bati:- turumvise kandi turahakanye, baca banyweshwa mumitima yabo intama kubera ubuhakanyi bwabo, rero nuvuge uti:- n’ikintu kibi cane cabategetse kubijanye nukwemera kwanyu nimwaba muri mu bantu bemera bimwe vy’ukuri
Vuga uti:- niyaba iyo nzu iri mw’Ijuru iri ku Mana ari rwanyu bwite hatarimwo abandi bantu, rero ni mwipfuze urupfu ni mwaba mwebwe muvugisha ukuri
Kandi ntibazo kwipfuza namba urwo rupfu kubera ivyo amaboko yabo yakoze, n’Imana irabazi neza abahemu bahemukiye imitima yabo

Kandi uzobabona bafise igihababu kininiya cane c’ukuba ngaha kw’Isi gusumba abandi bantu, n’ugusumba abagereranya Imana n’ibindi bintu, umwe wese muribo yipfuza yuko yoronka ubuzima bw’imyaka igihumbi, nuko kuronka ubwo buzima burebure ntibushobora kumukurira ibihano vyiwe, n’Imana irabibona ivyo bagira vyose

Vuga uti:- uwugira ihiganwa n’intumwa y’Imana Jibrilu (iii) mu vy’ukuri niyo yamanuye iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu mumutima wawe k’uruhusha rw’Imana ikaba yemeza ivyabayeho imbere yiwe, kandi n’uburongozi hamwe n’inkuru nziza ku bantu bemera Imana yabo y’ukuri

Uwuhiganwa n’Imana hamwe n’Abamarayika biwe, hamwe n’intumwa zayo zose, hamwe n’Umumarayika Jibrilu (iii) n’intumwa yayo Mikaeri (iii), nuko Imana izoba ariyo nyene intsinzi kuri abo bahakanyi b’Imana b’ukuri
Mu	vy’ukuri	twakumanuriye	ivyemezo	biri	k’umugaragaro,	kandi ntabantu babihakana ivyo vyemezo atari barya bononyi
Yoh! Umwanya uwariwo wose mugihe bapfunditse amasezerano yabo bamwe muribo baca biyonkora, ahubwo benshi muribo ayo masezerano ntibayemera
Mugihe bashikirwa n’intumwa y’Imana ivuye ku Mana yemeza ibiri kumwe nabo, umurwi umwe mubahawe igitabu waciye uta ico gitabu c’Imana gitagatifu inyuma y’imigono yabo, nkakumwe batakizi

Baciye	bakurikira	muvyo	amashetani	yababwira	kuntwaro	ya cami y’umwami	Sulaimanu	(iii)	nawe akaba	atahakanye	Imana	yiwe	y’ukuri, ahubwo amashetani niyo yahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri mukwigisha abantu uburozi,	kandi	ubwo	burozi	bwamanukanywe	n’Abamarayika	babiri	aribo Haruta na Maruta mu gisagara ca Babil, kandi ntibigishije uwariwe wese kugeza aho bamubwira bati:- mu vy’ukuri twebwe ni nk’ikibazo, mugabo ntuhakane	Imana	yawe y’ukuri, baca	biga	kuribo	muvyo	bashoboye	mu gutandukanya umuntu n’umukenyezi wiwe, kandi ntibari mu bantu bagira inabi	canke	mubadafise akamaro	kuribo, mu	vy’ukuri	barafise	ubumenyi bw’uko uwatoye ibi vyose atazoronka ahantu ahariho hose mw’ijuru, kandi ntankeka ni bibi cane muvyatumye bagurisha imitima yabo nkiyo babimenya
Nkiyo bemera hamwe nugutinya, ntankeka impembo ivuye ku Mana yari kuba nziza kuribo iyo babimenya
Mwebwe mwemeye Imana yanyu y’ukuri, ntimuvuge Raainaa, ahubwo nimuvuge muti:- ni muturabe, kandi ni mwumvirize, nayo abahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri, bazoronka ibihano bibabaza cane

Ntibashima abo bagereranya Imana n’ibindi bintu mu bantu bahawe igitabu canke muba gereranya Imana n’ibindi bintu muba manuriwe ineza ivuye ku Muremyi wanyu, n’Imana imanurira imigisha yayo kuwo yishakiye, nayo niyo nyene imigisha mininiya cane
